alert.note: Alert for Flagler; Putnam; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 1:13PM EDT until July 09 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Flagler County in northeastern Florida... St. Johns County in northeastern Florida... East central Putnam County in northeastern Florida... * Until 145 PM EDT. * At 112 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nocatee to near Pomona Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Bunnell, Hastings, Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland, Vilano Beach, South Ponte Vedra, Crescent Beach and Saint Augustine Shores. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
